column4: can someone help ssh into my server? i'm locked out for some reason... it was working a few weeks ago.
i can login through the web console to administer it
what kind of problem, times out, connection refused or it just doesn't like your password?
it just times out, doesn't even say anything back to me
are you sshing to right hostname, also check firewall/port forwards
is a web console a command line?
yeah, i added the port to my local router to allow the proper ssh port. I can ssh on a different port to a different server fine. I turned the firewall off on the server
is the server in question on a home internet connection? my isp blocks incoming to port 22
nah its slicehost
on my belkin router it asks for inbound port, private ip address and private port -- the open port on my server is 8787, does this mean i put 8787 in both inbound port and private port?
or do i use 22 on private port and 8787 on inbound port?
if you cant ssh in to your slice, and you can get on IRC from behind your router, probably dont have to worry about the router
okay, when i use the -vv option for ssh it says connection refused
do netstat -ntpl on the slice and see what port sshd is listening on
yeah its listening on the same port i'm trying to ssh into
here is my sshd conf file http://pastebin.com/MEPvCfGi
try to ssh to the box from the box like: ssh 209.2.3.3 -p 8787
yep thats what i'm doing
okay so try to ssh to the box from the box
let me try that
okay, so it worked fine, sshing from the remote box to itself using both 127.0.0.1 and its own ip address
